title: Finding Files
content:
find

find searches by walking directories and evaluating predicates.

cd ~/unix-cli-practice
find . -type f -name "*.json"
find . -type d -name "*demo*"

Common predicates

  • -type f file, -type d directory
  • -name / -iname pattern match
  • -mtime modified N days ago
  • -size filter by size

locate

locate is fast but depends on an index database (may not be enabled everywhere).

locate passwd | head
